about_the_game:
Complete your Beans experience with the full original soundtrack for Beans: The Coffee Shop Simulator.

This album contains 38 original tracks of chiptune-jazz as well as some more upbeat video-game inspired chiptune boss themes.
The album spans levels, which also span genres of jazz inspiration.

The files are provided in both MP3 and OGG format.

Track List



Miscellaneous
  • Beans Theme
  • The Calamitous Coffee Consortium
  • Caffeine Confrontation

Big City Showdown
  • Memories
  • Another Day
  • City Galore
  • Coffee Crunch
  • Espresscapade
  • Milk White

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 1 GHz Processor
  • Graphics: OpenGL Supported Graphics Adapter

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10
  • Processor: 1 GHz Processor
  • Graphics: OpenGL Supported Graphics Adapter
  • Additional Notes: Safari 8

name: Beans: The Coffee Shop Simulator - OST

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Beans: The Coffee Shop Simulator - OST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP Service Pack 3 or Better
  • Processor: 1 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL Supported Graphics Adapter
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit or Newer
  • Processor: 1 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia or AMD with at least 512MB VRAM and OpenGL 2.0+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Complete your Beans experience with the Original Soundtrack. Containing 36 original chiptune songs, you can take Beans wherever you go. Provided in MP3 and OGG format.
